articles.title: 25-year-old Thai star of Netflix series The Stranded dies in his sleep - AsiaOne
articles.description: Thai actor Beam Papangkorn Lerkchaleampote died yesterday (March 23) at the age of 25. According to media reports, Beam died in his sleep and his mother was the first to discover his body. Officials are investigating the cause of death. Beam rose to fame afte…
articles.content:
Thai actor Beam Papangkorn Lerkchaleampote died yesterday (March 23) at the age of 25.
According to media reports, Beam died in his sleep and his mother was the first to discover his body.

articles.title: Sony Music opens flagship S-E Asia headquarters in Singapore - The Straits Times
articles.description:
It houses Sony Music Entertainment, Sony Music Publishing and artiste and label services company The Orchard.

articles.content: SINGAPORE - Music and entertainment group Sony Music is cementing its long-term commitment to Singapore and South-east Asia as it opened its flagship headquarters in Singapore on Wednesday (March 23)… [+1804 chars]

articles.title: Software giant SAP opens $250 million lab in Singapore, to add 500 jobs - The Straits Times
articles.description:
SAP Labs Singapore is the first such facility by the German firm in South-east Asia, and its 21st globally.
. Read more at straitstimes.com.
